alert.note: Alert for Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 3:07PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gulf, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 307 PM EDT/207 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Stonemill Creek, or 15 miles southwest of Blountstown, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Abe Springs, Vilas, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Frink, Kinard, Lewis, Nixon Garden, Broad Branch, Chipola Park and Twin Pole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
